title: My league client has been crashing (patch 6.20)
body: Hi, my league client keeps crashing after like 1 minute. Any help would be highly appritiated

replies.body: Thanks for the update!  This can be happening for a few reasons, ranging from third party programs to your connection!  If you are using any apps like play.tv or overlays, remove them as third party programs have been known to cause issues during champion select.  If your issue persists, then your network might be having a issues staying connected and kicking you off.  Go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the fix!  That should get you squared away!
Sorry for being unspecific. But when i log into my client its all fine. When i start quing up for a game my game crashes and its say that lolclient.exe has stopped working

I'd like to help, but I really need more information on what's happening.  What do you mean by crashing?  Where and when exactly do you see it?  Are there any error messages, and what does it say?  Let me know!
